item.title: CV
item.description: Education Link to heading Slovak university of technology in Bratislava, Faculty of Informatics and Information Technologies (FIIT STU) 2018 - 2023 I got my bachelor’s and master’s degree here. Master’s thesis focused on Data lake development with the use of GenAI Work experience Link to heading PwC - Java backend developer Link to heading (02/2023 - present) My current job, working on microservices created in Java and Spring Boot. I work on a big project for US client, which is surprisingly using a lot of modern technologies - we are using Java 17 with Spring Boot 3, kubernetes infrastructure on Azure and Azure pipelines automating pretty much the whole software lifecycle.
